studentPayments.chargedSessionPrice: they are automatically charged the session price.
studentPayments.step1: Go to Attendance page and mark students present/absent
studentPayments.step2: System calculates: Present Students √ó Session Price = Revenue
studentPayments.step3: Revenue is automatically recorded as a transaction
studentPayments.step4: Group and course totals are updated instantly
